#{sec_uni_code,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT fund_basic_info.mana_uni_code com_uni_code, org_basic_info.org_name FROM org_basic_info, fund_basic_info WHERE fund_basic_info.mana_uni_code = org_basic_info.com_uni_code AND fund_basic_info.mana_uni_code NOT IN ( '162716', '196074', '485754', '485753', '181033', '165873', '220917', '462942', '0' )
